meanings.definition: A place where people play pool.
meanings.sent1: My friends and I enjoy hanging out at the poolhalls on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Let's meet at the poolhalls after school to shoot some pool.
meanings.sent3: The poolhalls were so crowded that we had to wait for a turn to play.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of poolhalls, he found his favorite spot to practice his shots.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the poolhalls beckoned us in for a night of fun.

meanings.sent1: There are many poolhalls in this city where you can play billiards.
meanings.sent2: The poolhalls in this town have different atmospheres and styles.
meanings.sent3: When we entered the poolhalls, we were amazed by the variety of pool tables.
meanings.sent4: The poolhalls on that street are known for their friendly staff and clean facilities.
